RecommendationRule RecommendationRule Class

In this Article

Edit

Represents a recommendation rule that the recommendation engine can perform.

Syntax

Declaration

public class RecommendationRulePublic Class RecommendationRule

  • Object
    Object
  • RecommendationRule

Constructors summary

RecommendationRule()
RecommendationRule()

Initializes a new instance of the RecommendationRule class.
RecommendationRule(String, String, String, Nullable<Guid>, String, String, Nullable<NotificationLevel>, Nullable<Channels>, IList<String>)
RecommendationRule(String, String, String, Nullable(Of Guid), String, String, Nullable(Of NotificationLevel), Nullable(Of Channels), IList(Of String))

Initializes a new instance of the RecommendationRule class.

Properties summary

ActionName
ActionName

Gets or sets name of action that is recommended by this rule in string.
Channels
Channels

Gets or sets list of available channels that this rule applies. Possible values include: 'Notification', 'Api', 'Email', 'Webhook', 'All'
Description
Description

Gets or sets localized detailed description of the rule.
DisplayName
DisplayName

Gets or sets UI friendly name of the rule.
Level
Level

Gets or sets level of impact indicating how critical this rule is. Possible values include: 'Critical', 'Warning', 'Information', 'NonUrgentSuggestion'
Message
Message

Gets or sets localized name of the rule (Good for UI).
Name
Name

Gets or sets unique name of the rule.
RecommendationId
RecommendationId

Gets or sets recommendation ID of an associated recommendation object tied to the rule, if exists. If such an object doesn't exist, it is set to null.
Tags
Tags

Gets or sets an array of category tags that the rule contains.

    RecommendationRule(String, String, String, Nullable(Of Guid), String, String, Nullable(Of NotificationLevel), Nullable(Of Channels), IList(Of String))

    Initializes a new instance of the RecommendationRule class.

    public RecommendationRule(string name = null, string displayName = null, string message = null, Guid? recommendationId = null, string description = null, string actionName = null, NotificationLevel? level = null, Channels? channels = null, IList<string> tags = null)Public Sub New(name As String = Nothing, displayName As String = Nothing, message As String = Nothing, recommendationId As Guid? = Nothing, description As String = Nothing, actionName As String = Nothing, level As NotificationLevel? = Nothing, channels As Channels? = Nothing, tags As IList(Of String) = Nothing)

    Parameters

    • name
      String
      String

      Unique name of the rule.

    • displayName
      String
      String

      UI friendly name of the rule.

    • message
      String
      String

      Localized name of the rule (Good for UI).

    • recommendationId
      Nullable<Guid>
      Nullable(Of Guid)

      Recommendation ID of an associated recommendation object tied to the rule, if exists. If such an object doesn't exist, it is set to null.

    • description
      String
      String

      Localized detailed description of the rule.

    • actionName
      String
      String

      Name of action that is recommended by this rule in string.

    • level
      Nullable<NotificationLevel>
      Nullable(Of NotificationLevel)

      Level of impact indicating how critical this rule is. Possible values include: 'Critical', 'Warning', 'Information', 'NonUrgentSuggestion'

    • channels
      Nullable<Channels>
      Nullable(Of Channels)

      List of available channels that this rule applies. Possible values include: 'Notification', 'Api', 'Email', 'Webhook', 'All'

    • tags
      IList<String>
      IList(Of String)

      An array of category tags that the rule contains.
